Class ClientBroker

  • java.lang.Object
    • saitMLS.problemDomain.clientale.ClientBroker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    saitMLS.persistance.Broker

    public class ClientBroker
extends java.lang.Object
implements saitMLS.persistance.Broker
    ClientBroker handles the Random Access File backend for the client part of the SAIT MLS GUI Assignment

    800977
